alert.note: Alert for McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:07AM CDT until July 23 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR MCHENRY COUNTY... At 1207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woodstock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crystal Lake, McHenry, Woodstock, Fox Lake, Island Lake, Marengo, Cary, Johnsburg, Lakemoor, Spring Grove, Wonder Lake, Lakewood, Pistakee Highlands, Oakwood Hills, Prairie Grove, Richmond, Port Barrington, Bull Valley, McCullom Lake and Ringwood. This includes... Mchenry County College, Mchenry County Fairgrounds, and Moraine Hills State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
